name: Thronebreaker: The Witcher Tales
notes: Downloads and executes: https://github.com/z0z0z/mf-install This registers all the dlls needed for video playback.

files.goginstaller: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Thronebreaker/Thronebreaker.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SILENT /VERYSILENT /NORESTART /CLOSEAPPLICATIONS
    description: 'Installing Thronebreaker: The Witcher Tales'
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
